titleStmt.title: Letter from Quick to Chancellor Hastings, August 12, 1918

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Letter from Quick to Chancellor Hastings, August 12, 1918
bibl.note: This image is a scan of a photocopy made from another unspecified collection. The letter should be located and rescanned when possible.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Nebraska-Lincoln Archives and Special Collections
msIdentifier.collection: RG 570904 Donald A. Lentz and Gary R. Steffens, Marching Band Records

correspAction.placeName: 21 North Nevada Ave., Colorado Springs. Colo

opener.salute:
Chancellor N. Y. Hastings
University of Nebraska
Lincoln
Dear Sir. -

div1.p: Your’s of Aug., 9 recieved [received] and in reply will say I would be very glad to take up the work with the University band. My engagement here ends Sept., 7. so will be in Lincoln in time for the opening of college year. Please except [accept] my thanks for remembering me, and if I recieve [receive] appointment, will do my best to give the University a fine Military band.

closer.seg:
21 – North Nevada Ave.
Colorado Springs. Colo.
